-00005130: 332e 2041 7272 616e 6769 6e67 2061 6e64  3. Arranging and
-00005140: 2073 7461 636b 696e 6720 706c 6f74 730a   stacking plots.

-00005160: 6220 6d6f 6475 6c65 2070 726f 7669 6465  b module provide

+00004420: 2e20 4372 6561 7469 6e67 2065 7861 6d70  . Creating examp
+00004430: 6c65 2070 6c6f 7473 0a20 0a43 7265 6174  le plots. .Creat
+00004440: 696e 6720 736f 6d65 2065 7861 6d70 6c65  ing some example
+00004450: 2070 6c6f 7473 2075 7369 6e67 2074 6865   plots using the
+00004460: 2073 6561 7262 6f72 6e20 6d6f 6475 6c65   searborn module
+00004470: 2e20 4272 6963 6b20 636c 6173 7320 7072  . Brick class pr
+00004480: 6f76 6964 6564 2062 7920 7468 6520 7061  ovided by the pa
+00004490: 7463 6877 6f72 6b6c 6962 206d 6f64 756c  tchworklib modul
+000044a0: 6520 6973 2069 6d70 6c65 6d65 6e74 6564  e is implemented
+000044b0: 2061 7320 7375 6263 6c61 7373 206f 6620   as subclass of 
+000044c0: 606d 6174 706c 6f74 6c69 622e 6178 6573  `matplotlib.axes
+000044d0: 2e41 7865 7360 2e20 2054 6865 7265 666f  .Axes`.  Therefo
+000044e0: 7265 2c20 4272 6963 6b20 636c 6173 7320  re, Brick class 
+000044f0: 6f62 6a65 6374 2063 616e 2062 6520 6769  object can be gi
+00004500: 7665 6e20 746f 2074 6865 2073 6561 626f  ven to the seabo
+00004510: 726e 2070 6c6f 7420 6675 6e63 7469 6f6e  rn plot function
+00004520: 7320 7468 6174 2068 6176 6520 7468 6520  s that have the 
+00004530: 6061 7860 2070 6172 616d 6574 6572 732e  `ax` parameters.
+00004540: 2020 0a0a 5768 656e 2063 7265 6174 696e    ..When creatin
+00004550: 6720 6120 4272 6963 6b20 636c 6173 7320  g a Brick class 
+00004560: 6f62 6a65 6374 2c20 7468 6520 606c 6162  object, the `lab
+00004570: 656c 6020 7661 6c75 6520 7368 6f75 6c64  el` value should
+00004580: 2062 6520 7370 6563 6966 6965 642c 2061   be specified, a
+00004590: 6e64 2069 7420 7368 6f75 6c64 2062 6520  nd it should be 
+000045a0: 756e 6971 7565 2061 6d6f 6e67 2074 6865  unique among the
+000045b0: 2042 7269 636b 2063 6c61 7373 206f 626a   Brick class obj
+000045c0: 6563 7473 2067 656e 6572 6174 6564 2069  ects generated i
+000045d0: 6e20 7468 6520 7079 7468 6f6e 2073 6372  n the python scr
+000045e0: 6970 7420 2849 6620 7468 6520 6c61 6265  ipt (If the labe
+000045f0: 6c20 7661 6c75 6520 6973 206e 6f74 2073  l value is not s
+00004600: 7065 6369 6669 6564 2c20 7468 6520 756e  pecified, the un
+00004610: 6971 7565 206c 6162 656c 206e 616d 6520  ique label name 
+00004620: 6973 2061 7574 6f6d 6174 6963 616c 6c79  is automatically
+00004630: 2067 6976 656e 2e20 4279 2075 7369 6e67   given. By using
+00004640: 2060 6765 745f 6c61 6265 6c28 2960 206d   `get_label()` m
+00004650: 6574 686f 642c 2074 6865 2076 616c 7565  ethod, the value
+00004660: 2063 616e 2062 6520 636f 6e66 6972 6d65   can be confirme
+00004670: 6429 2e20 5468 6520 6066 6967 6973 697a  d). The `figisiz
+00004680: 6560 2070 6172 616d 6574 6572 2063 616e  e` parameter can
+00004690: 2061 6c73 6f20 6265 2073 7065 6369 6669   also be specifi
+000046a0: 6564 2e20 486f 7765 7665 722c 2074 6865  ed. However, the
+000046b0: 2076 616c 7565 2069 7320 6e6f 7420 7665   value is not ve
+000046c0: 7279 2069 6d70 6f72 7461 6e74 2062 6563  ry important bec
+000046d0: 6175 7365 2074 6865 2066 6967 7572 6520  ause the figure 
+000046e0: 7369 7a65 206f 6620 4272 6963 6b20 636c  size of Brick cl
+000046f0: 6173 7320 6f62 6a65 6374 7320 6361 6e20  ass objects can 
+00004700: 6265 2061 7574 6f6d 6174 6963 616c 6c79  be automatically
+00004710: 2061 646a 7573 7465 6420 696e 2061 7272   adjusted in arr
+00004720: 616e 6769 6e67 2074 6865 2070 6c6f 7473  anging the plots
+00004730: 2e20 5468 6520 6073 6176 6566 6967 2860  . The `savefig(`
+00004740: 2a60 6669 6c65 6e61 6d65 3d73 7472 602a  *`filename=str`*
+00004750: 6029 6020 6d65 7468 6f64 2072 6574 7572  `)` method retur
+00004760: 6e73 2060 6d61 7470 6c6f 746c 6962 2e66  ns `matplotlib.f
+00004770: 6967 7572 652e 4669 6775 7265 6020 636c  igure.Figure` cl
+00004780: 6173 7320 6f62 6a65 6374 2e20 4966 2060  ass object. If `
+00004790: 6669 6c65 6e61 6d65 6020 6973 2067 6976  filename` is giv
+000047a0: 656e 2c20 7468 6520 6669 6775 7265 206f  en, the figure o
+000047b0: 626a 6563 7420 6361 6e20 6265 206f 7574  bject can be out
+000047c0: 7075 7420 746f 2074 6865 2066 696c 652e  put to the file.
+000047d0: 0a0a 6060 6070 7974 686f 6e0a 696d 706f  ..```python.impo

-00004040: 7265 6174 696e 6720 6578 616d 706c 6520  reating example 
-00004050: 706c 6f74 730a 200a 4372 6561 7469 6e67  plots. .Creating
-00004060: 2073 6f6d 6520 6578 616d 706c 6520 706c   some example pl
-00004070: 6f74 7320 7573 696e 6720 7468 6520 7365  ots using the se
-00004080: 6172 626f 726e 206d 6f64 756c 652e 2042  arborn module. B
-00004090: 7269 636b 2063 6c61 7373 2070 726f 7669  rick class provi
-000040a0: 6465 6420 6279 2074 6865 2070 6174 6368  ded by the patch
-000040b0: 776f 726b 6c69 6220 6d6f 6475 6c65 2069  worklib module i
-000040c0: 7320 696d 706c 656d 656e 7465 6420 6173  s implemented as
-000040d0: 2073 7562 636c 6173 7320 6f66 2060 6d61   subclass of `ma
-000040e0: 7470 6c6f 746c 6962 2e61 7865 732e 4178  tplotlib.axes.Ax
-000040f0: 6573 602e 2020 5468 6572 6566 6f72 652c  es`.  Therefore,
-00004100: 2042 7269 636b 2063 6c61 7373 206f 626a   Brick class obj
-00004110: 6563 7420 6361 6e20 6265 2067 6976 656e  ect can be given
-00004120: 2074 6f20 7468 6520 7365 6162 6f72 6e20   to the seaborn 
-00004130: 706c 6f74 2066 756e 6374 696f 6e73 2074  plot functions t
-00004140: 6861 7420 6861 7665 2074 6865 2060 6178  hat have the `ax
-00004150: 6020 7061 7261 6d65 7465 7273 2e20 200a  ` parameters.  .
-00004160: 0a57 6865 6e20 6372 6561 7469 6e67 2061  .When creating a
-00004170: 2042 7269 636b 2063 6c61 7373 206f 626a   Brick class obj
-00004180: 6563 742c 2074 6865 2060 6c61 6265 6c60  ect, the `label`
-00004190: 2076 616c 7565 2073 686f 756c 6420 6265   value should be
-000041a0: 2073 7065 6369 6669 6564 2c20 616e 6420   specified, and 
-000041b0: 6974 2073 686f 756c 6420 6265 2075 6e69  it should be uni
-000041c0: 7175 6520 616d 6f6e 6720 7468 6520 4272  que among the Br
-000041d0: 6963 6b20 636c 6173 7320 6f62 6a65 6374  ick class object
-000041e0: 7320 6765 6e65 7261 7465 6420 696e 2074  s generated in t
-000041f0: 6865 2070 7974 686f 6e20 7363 7269 7074  he python script
-00004200: 2028 4966 2074 6865 206c 6162 656c 2076   (If the label v
-00004210: 616c 7565 2069 7320 6e6f 7420 7370 6563  alue is not spec
-00004220: 6966 6965 642c 2074 6865 2075 6e69 7175  ified, the uniqu
-00004230: 6520 6c61 6265 6c20 6e61 6d65 2069 7320  e label name is 
-00004240: 6175 746f 6d61 7469 6361 6c6c 7920 6769  automatically gi
-00004250: 7665 6e2e 2042 7920 7573 696e 6720 6067  ven. By using `g
-00004260: 6574 5f6c 6162 656c 2829 6020 6d65 7468  et_label()` meth

+00002970: 2323 2323 2022 7374 6163 6b22 2066 7563  #### "stack" fuc
+00002980: 6e74 696f 6e0a 4920 696d 706c 656d 656e  ntion.I implemen
+00002990: 7465 6420 7468 6520 6073 7461 636b 6020  ted the `stack` 
+000029a0: 6675 6e63 7469 6f6e 2e20 5468 6973 2066  function. This f

+00003580: 0a23 2320 5573 6167 650a 3e20 5f49 6620  .## Usage.> _If 
+00003590: 796f 7520 7761 6e74 2074 6f20 6b6e 6f77  you want to know
+000035a0: 2068 6f77 2074 6f20 7573 6520 7061 7463   how to use patc

+00004ef0: 2e20 4172 7261 6e67 696e 6720 616e 6420  . Arranging and

-00002bf0: 6675 6e63 7469 6f6e 2061 6c6c 6f77 7320  function allows 
-00002c00: 7573 6572 7320 746f 2061 7272 616e 6765  users to arrange

-00002c20: 7468 616e 2074 776f 2920 4272 6963 6b20  than two) Brick 
-00002c30: 6f72 2042 7269 636b 7320 6f62 6a65 6374  or Bricks object
-00002c40: 7320 616c 6f6e 6720 7468 6520 7370 6563  s along the spec

-00002c60: 6173 2066 6f6c 6c6f 7773 2e0a 0a60 6060  as follows...```

-00003ab0: 723d 2831 2e30 352c 2031 2e30 2929 0a61  r=(1.05, 1.0)).a
-00003ac0: 7832 2e73 6574 5f74 6974 6c65 2822 6178  x2.set_title("ax

-00003ae0: 6178 320a 6178 3132 2e73 6176 6566 6967  ax2.ax12.savefig
-00003af0: 2822 6178 3132 2e70 6e67 2229 0a60 6060  ("ax12.png").```

-00005130: 332e 2041 7272 616e 6769 6e67 2061 6e64  3. Arranging and
-00005140: 2073 7461 636b 696e 6720 706c 6f74 730a   stacking plots.
-00005150: 0a54 6865 2070 6174 6368 776f 726b 6c69  .The patchworkli
-00005160: 6220 6d6f 6475 6c65 2070 726f 7669 6465  b module provide
-00005170: 7320 7477 6f20 6f70 6572 6174 6f72 7320  s two operators 
-00005180: 2220 607c 6022 2c20 2260 2f60 2220 7468  " `|`", "`/`" th
-00005190: 6174 2065 6e61 626c 6520 6465 7369 676e  at enable design
-000051a0: 696e 6720 7469 6479 206c 6179 6f75 7420  ing tidy layout 
-000051b0: 666f 7220 6d75 6c74 6970 6c65 2070 6c6f  for multiple plo
-000051c0: 7473 2077 6974 6820 7369 6d70 6c65 206f  ts with simple o
-000051d0: 7065 7261 7469 6f6e 732e 2054 6865 2022  perations. The "
-000051e0: 607c 6022 206f 7065 7261 746f 7220 7769  `|`" operator wi
-000051f0: 6c6c 2070 6c61 6365 2074 6865 2070 6c6f  ll place the plo
-00005200: 7473 2062 6573 6964 6520 6561 6368 206f  ts beside each o
-00005210: 7468 6572 2c20 7768 696c 6520 7468 6520  ther, while the 
-00005220: 2260 2f60 2220 6f70 6572 6174 6f72 2077  "`/`" operator w
-00005230: 696c 6c20 7374 6163 6b20 7468 656d 2e0a  ill stack them..
-00005240: 0a60 6060 7079 7468 6f6e 0a23 4172 7261  .```python.#Arra
-00005250: 6e67 6520 2261 7831 2c22 2022 6178 322c  nge "ax1," "ax2,

+00005200: 2033 2e20 4172 7261 6e67 696e 6720 616e   3. Arranging an
+00005210: 6420 7374 6163 6b69 6e67 2070 6c6f 7473  d stacking plots
+00005220: 0a0a 5468 6520 7061 7463 6877 6f72 6b6c  ..The patchworkl
+00005230: 6962 206d 6f64 756c 6520 7072 6f76 6964  ib module provid
+00005240: 6573 2074 776f 206f 7065 7261 746f 7273  es two operators

+00005310: 0a0a 6060 6070 7974 686f 6e0a 2341 7272  ..```python.#Arr
